model.name: flight
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Flights ( delay string PRIMARY KEY, iata varchar(50), state varchar(50) ) AS SELECT delay, iata, state FROM (EXEC ws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'airport/status/SFO?format=application/xml', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/root/RestResponse/result' PASSING JSONTOXML('root', f.result) COLUMNS delay string PATH 'delay/text()', iata string PATH 'IATA/text()', state string PATH 'state/text()') AS A;
